name: The Island Story
description:
Game Systems

Day Circle:
The game time is based on 24 hours. There is a separate day and night system, including sunrise, sunset, and the absence of the moon, etc. The atmosphere of the sky and the environment will also change with different times of the day.


Placement:：

player can freely choose the animals and plants location in the game, decorative items can be Piled up and rotated.



Explore New Species:

The game provides more than 50 plants, 20 animals and 30 decorative items from various continents.

Obtaining new species requires players to explore the world map. Entering 3 values (1-100) in the exploration interface, which respectively represent the temperature, humidity, and sunlight. When the 3 values all meet a preset value of the system, players can obtain the samples of specific plants. Each plant in the game will have a text prompt to tell players the approximate values.

Grow：

Animals and plants have their own unique lifespans. Each plant will slowly grow until it matures. After death, it will generate new animals and plants and start a new life.
